lines.text: Sherman, I think I do remember hearing something on TV about colon cleansin'. They say everyone should have one. I'm thinkin' about gettin' me an appointment and go down and get my colon cleansed thoroughly.
You want your colon cleansed? Fine, I'm gonna clean mine.
[lets a loud fart, and Ernie Jr. starts laughing harder and harder]
There. Now my colon is clean. I'm talking squeaky clean.
Every time we have a meal, you start breaking gas. Don't break gas and destroy our meal.
Don't tell me to stop! You're the one that brought up colon cleansin' and all that mess!
I did not say anything about breakin' gas! I said I was going to get my colon cleaned.
Don't you talk about puttin' a tube up somebody's ass, but I can't break wind.
I didn't say nothin' about puttin' no hose up nobody's ass. Clesius, I said -...
What you think a colonic is? You think you're gonna run your asshole by the car wash?
[Ernie Jr. starts choking from eating and out of control laughter]
You're chokin' the baby.
As Iong as I pay the bills, I do what I want at this table. Case in point.
[lets another loud fart]
Who will call my name?
Yeah, I'll call you up if your name is -...
[farts in finishing his sentence, then laughs in mockery]
Keep insulting me.
[picks up a knife]
I'll toss this between the crack of your ass.
You know, I can go all night.
[lets another loud fart]
I hope you fart until your asshole falls out.
[Clesius lets another fart, and then Ernie Jr. manages to follow along]
Oh, my baby too!
[Clesius lets another loud fart that this time sounds wet]
Oops! Now see what you made me do?
[starts running away clutching his pants]
Goddamn it, I messed up my pants!
Come on, Cletus! It aint nuthin' but a short walk. You might walk over, but you limpin' back! I aint no easy win, nigga!
Cletus, come clean this garbage up.
Man, I'm watchin' TV!
I'll kick your lazy ass up.
I told you, none of your damn business!
You lazy mother...!
Daddy, all I'm saying is that scientific breakthroughs are occurring all the time.
The only thing that's 'bout to break through is your ass 'bout to break through the seat of your pants.
Cletus, the dog has ripped the garbage bag open again.
Well, shoot the damn dog!
I ain't shootin' no dog!
I'm tryin' to watch "Roseanne."
I assure you, I will not let you down.

You won't. I know you won't. As a matter of fact, I know you're going to be perfect! Do you know how I know all these things? I know them because if you're *not* perfect, nevermind the yelling, the screaming and the firing. If anything goes wrong, for any reason
[pause]
I'm going to kill you. And I don't mean that as a euphemism, I am going to literally kill you. I'm going to strangle you and choke off your air supply until you pass away.
What's wrong with that breath? I can smell it over here! Reggie, your breath is so stinky, people look forward to your farts. Breath smells like shit! Do you smell shit?
[sniffs]
I SMELL SHIT!
[Sherman has bloated back into himself after being Buddy Love at the banquet]

If you give me a moment, I can explain. My research is, um... Well, when I started out, I wanted to help people. But then I became desperate and selfish. And what I did was wrong. Buddy's who I thought the whole world wanted me to be. He's who I thought I wanted to be. And sometimes when you want something so so bad, you'll do just about anything to get it. But I learned one thing from Buddy. Life isn't about being happy with how much you weigh, but just being happy with yourself. I'm terribly sorry about all of this, I hope I haven't ruined everybody's evening. Please excuse me.
[to Carla]
Sorry.
You can sew up your stomach and your asshole and you will always be fat.
Someone has to tend to Chunky Butt's sex life. Chunky Butt is extremely horny.

[making fun of Reggie's hair]
Reggie, I heard of dreadlocks, but shitlocks? That ain't you hair, man. Take that pile of shit off your head.

[touches her sexually]
Is that a test tube in my pocket, or am I just happy to see you?

[pushes away]
Ugh! How dare you!
Oh, you know you love it. I felt your percolating.
Reggie's mother is so fat... her blood type is rocky road!
[everyone cheers except Reggie]
Last one! Reggie's mother's so fat... HER BELT SIZE IS EQUATOR!
[everyone except Reggie loudly roars with laughter]

[about Reggie]
I hate this guy. I hate this guy, he is so obnoxious.

[ignores her]
Give the nigger a chance.

[to Reggie]
Ok, fat jokes! You wanna do fat jokes?
[Buddy stands up]
Alright!
[Buddy claps his hands once]
Your mother's so fat, the bitch needs Thomas Guide to find her asshole!
[everyone in the room, except Reggie, roars with laughter]
Alright! Wait, wait, wait, your mother's so fat, after sex I roll over twice, and I'm still on the bitch!
[everyone, except Reggie, laughs louder]

[to Reggie]
Your mother is so fat, she fell in the Grand Canyon and got stuck!
[everyone, except Reggie, laughs even louder]
Reggie's mother's so fat, that the bitch gets her toenails painted at Earl Scheib!
[everyone in the room, except Reggie, loudly roars with laughter. Buddy climbs onto the stage]

[walking past Reggie]
Earl Scheib! At Earl Scheib!
[laughs]
When the good Lord made you, He made you beautiful inside and out.
[Professor Sherman Klump grunts and groans trying to fit his obese frame into an office chair; he finally gets comfortable and sighs with relief]
Comfy?
Quite.
Anything I can get for you? Juice? Coffee? Rack of lamb?
No, sir, I'm fine.
Don't give me none o' dem mashed potatoes, you know mashed potatoes give me gas.
Tank ass!
Tinkerbell!
Blubber butt!
Featherweight!
[starts coughing heavily]
Everybody better cover your plate.
Here, momma, have some water.
Whatcha talking' about cover your plate? Not tonight, Cletus. I'll kick your ass.

The truth is, Carla, I'm a big man. Now I will lose weight, but I'm always gonna be big no matter what I do. So anyone I end up with is just going to have to accept me for who I am. More importantly, I'm going to have to accept *myself* for who I am.
Boy's ass is so fat, he's got more crack than Harlem!
I've got a date at the Alumni Ball, and you've got a date with linoleum.
Who?
[Buddy punches Jason, who falls to the floor in a heap]
Oh you mean rich dummy terms? I'll break it down. All the rich dummies in the room, listen up! If you gonna eat nasty stuff like this.
[Picks up a porkchop]

I know it looks good and I know how many of here like porkchop. But this greasy, nasty porkchop, you know there's a gene in your DNA that routes this straight to your fat cells, and it causes all sorts of sightly conditions. Case in point, this woman has what I like to call jello arms...
[shakes a fat lady's arm]
...you notice the arm has taken on a gelatin sort of vibe. Quite nasty.
[moves to a man at another table]
And to my left, this gentleman has turkey neck,
[Moves to the woman next to him]
to my immediate left, this young lady is suffering from what we like to call saddlebag syndrome
[moves to the woman next to her]
and to my extreme left, this lady is suffering from what we like to call... tank ass.
[the woman's husband gets up]
Yo, not tonight, man.
[escorts him back into his seat]

I'm your brother, I'm your brother. Like I was saying, ladies and gentlemen, where there's a will, there's a way, and there is a way we can turn these genes off, and I don't mean by using exercise or diet, I'm talking about by taking a simple solution, which helps reconstruct your metabolic cellular strands, thus giving you the appearance of,
[picks a nice lady]
as they say in medical terms... gluteus minimus, or in layman's terms, an extremely tight, wonderful ass. Let's give it up for the woman with the nice ass.
[a bit of the other people applaud]
She's worked so hard, don't you agree? Have a seat have a seat. Wow, everybody has a nice ass at this table, is this the nice ass section?

Who you think you talkin' to, Sherman Klump? Man, if you ever talk to me like that again, I'll kill you. And I don't mean it as euphemism, I'm gonna literally kill you. I'm gonna *strangle* you and cut off *your* air supply until *you* pass away.
Women be shoppin'! You cannot stop a woman from shoppin'!
I just had to come over and introduce myself because I've been following your work for many years and I'm a big fan!
Well, thank you very much! I'm fatter, er, *flattered* that you've been following my work the way you have.
Boy's so fat, when he goes outside with a red shirt on, all the kids in the neighbourhood shout Kool Aid!

[When Sherman is 'fighting' Buddy on the stage]
Someone had better go and call the exorcist!

[to Carla]
Are you ready to go upstairs?
[Carla slaps him]
I guess not.
Hercules! Hercules! Hercules!

[to Reggie]
It's your world, dog! I'm just a squrrel trying to get a nut!
I know a good church down there on Main Street, but they won't marry you if you're a lesbian.
Spandex! All spandex!
You're not pathetic! People! Pounds do not lose themselves! You have to work! Work! Work! Everybody up! Get up! You, too, at home. Everybody up and say...
[w/audience]
Yes, I can!
[alone]
Say it again.
[w/audience]
Yes, I can!

[determined]
Yes, I can!
[stomps on the floor]
Yes, I can! Yes...!
Quiet down, damn it!
Sorry 'bout that down there, Mr. Wilson!
Klump, shut up!

[sets to work]
I can!

[as a giant Sherman comes through the city]
Run for the hills everyone, it's Fatzilla!
[chuckles]
Boy he looks like King Kong with titties.
Boy's so fat, when they cut his ass open with a pen-knife, it bleed chocolate milk! What would you do for a klondike bar?

[seeing Buddy revert to Sherman while in the car with him]
Oh, man! This is Freddy Krueger shit, man!

[as Grandma continues talking, to his wife]
That's your ho ass mama.

[whispers]
Cletus!
